ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): if widget.ProviderWidget == None or widget.ProviderWidget.Entity == None: return
capaOrdemCompra = widget.ProviderWidget.Entity
emCadastro = capaOrdemCompra.EstaEmCadastro()
widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = emCadastro widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = emCadastro widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = emCadastro widget.View.Commands["CMD_GERARENTREGAS"].Visible = emCadastro widget.View.Commands["CMD_EXCLUIRTODASENTREGAS"].Visible = emCadastro
